body:

Just interesting to know...

title: Death while playing Pokemon GO

replies.body:
"was ambushed"

So what the story is saying is... Yes they were playing Pokemon Go at the time, but it seemed to be a planned murder?

Also, these idiots don't realize you can't track people through the game. They probably weren't even near a pokestop too
